title: A World where Mercenary Men are Called Goddesses - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Brotherhood   Character Growth   Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Evil Protagonist   Gunfighters   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Knights   Master-Servant Relationship   Mercenaries   Military   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Strategic Battles   Summoned Hero   Threesome   Transported to Another World   Wars   Younger Love Interests
author: 野原 耳子
description:
Yuichiro, a 37-year-old freelance mercenary, was blown unconscious by a grenade during a guerrilla war and found himself in a strange world. In that world, the princes are currently fighting over the throne, and civil war is brewing. 

Apparently, Yuichiro was summoned as a [Goddess] to help the boy who is the [Rightful King] and save the country. An old man like himself is the Goddess? On top of that, in order to return to his original world, he has to give birth to the king’s child?　

Yuichiro is disgusted, but in exchange for money, he joined the war in another world…>
